game.name: Muddy Village Car Stunt
game.description:
Many crazy fans of speed and stunt games have already reached out here to take their fantasy to the next level. Would you also like to enjoy the spirit of driving in a completely new environment? If yes, Muddy Village Car Stunt game can be a nice bet for you. We got you covered with a brand new racing challenge where you have to perform some cool drifting moves to stay in the game. Your nice drifting skills will surely bring some points in the end.

There are multiple latest four car models like Camaro, Mustang GT, M4 and Beetle to choose from. Select your car model and get ready to drive it on muddy roads like a pro in this HTML5 car game! Put your fingers on the controls and gear up to drift your vehicle while avoiding the obstacles to collect points! A nice drift will also bring some high excitement and entertainment for you in this 3D stunt driving simulation game.

Collect gold coins and do not forget to take as many actions as you can to collect enough gold coins to unlock new cool car options! There are multiple ramps with different shapes to ride on for your car so you would not enough time to relax. Enter the arena and show your insane driving and drifting skills to overcome all the obstacles nicely! Do everything right from facing ramps and platforms to the loopings to complete all the levels! Common boys! Many new car racing titles are waiting for you on atmegame.com that are available to play online for free, no download required.
